item.title: Ys vs. Trails in the Sky: Alternative Saga delayed “by a few months” in the west
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

No longer due out this summer.

Publisher refint/games and developer Falcom have delayed crossover fighting game Ys vs. Trails in the Sky: Alternative Saga from its previously planned summer release window “by a few months,” the companies announced. It will be available for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG.

Here is the full message from refint/games on the delay:

Greetings, adventurers and bracers!

It has been a while since our last update on Ys vs. Trails in the Sky: Alternative Saga, and we want to thank everyone for their patience during this time. Development has been steadily progressing but an unforeseen circumstance outside our control arose, preventing us from continuing work and forced us to reassess our release schedule and make the necessary adjustments.

While our original target was a summer release, after careful consideration, we have decided to delay the game by a few months. This will give us the time needed to ensure that every aspect of the game, from the gameplay to the presentation, meets the quality we strive for and that fans deserve.

We understand it is disappointing to wait longer than expected, but we are confident this decision will lead to a stronger, more polished experience at launch. In the coming weeks, we will be sharing more details, new screenshots, additional information!

Please stay tuned for the upcoming release date trailer! Thank you again for your continued support and enthusiasm!



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/ys-vs-trails-in-the-sky-alternative-saga-delayed-by-a-few-months-in-the-west
